name: DateCouple App Concept
description:
Another exploration from a couple months ago. I created a dating app concept called DateCouple


DateCouple is a social dating app that partners with a lot of F&B restaurants and bars. But this app is focused for the Man who is finding a girl to date, the main flow will search nearby and schedule a date with a girl, then after the girl accepts they can chat inside the app and come over to the location.


Hope you like it!
